dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset consists of 5000 color images and the corresponding fine-annotated semantic labels. It includes 19 of the 30 available classes for evaluation, with 2975 images for training and 500 images for validation.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset

dcterms:creator: A Gaidon
Q Wang
Y Cabon
E Vig
dcterms:description: The Virtual Kitti dataset is a photo-realistic synthetic dataset for semantic segmentation containing 50 video sequences in different weather conditions, totaling 21260 images, with corresponding ground-truth available for each video frame.
dcterms:title: Virtual Kitti Dataset
